title: final_night_temperature_record_duck_coop
summary: Final temperature and humidity record of the day inside the duck coop.
description: This data unit documents the final environmental condition of the day at MaMeeFarm. The measurement was taken inside the duck coop using a digital thermometer. The record closes the daily environmental monitoring loop and provides reference for night-time animal welfare and humidity conditions.

external_reference.note: External reference provided for verification only.
